name: 9th International Conference on Advanced Research in Social Sciences and Humanities
content: Having successfully launched the eighth edition of the ICARSH conference, we are happy to announce that the 9th International Conference on Advanced Research in Social Sciences and Humanities will take place in March 2025 in Vienna, Austria. Taking place on March 07-09, 2025, ICARSH will continue the tradition of delighting its attendees with tailored presentations, relevant discussions, lively networking, and limitless learning opportunities. Take note of the important deadlines – whether you’re joining as a virtual, poster, oral presenter or attendee. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to get published in indexed journals and share your findings with our extensive network of international academics. We invite you to join the event, take in the knowledge, participate in discussions, and contribute to the continuous development of the fields of social sciences and humanities. See you at ICARSH!
